title: 03/24/21 DPS Hour 2 Jim and Buddy Boeheim
itunes:title: 03/24/21 DPS Hour 2 Jim and Buddy Boeheim
description:
Buddy and Jim Boeheim talk to Dan about the recruitment process to get Buddy to Syracuse. Buddy tells Dan that he does have the green light to shoot.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
